Title: Lord-Aquilor
Legend: Lord-Aquilors are masters of the hunt, tracking their quarry alongside their Vanguard warriors. When the foe is cornered, the Aquilors strike with relentless precision, their fury delivered with the same savage swiftness as that of their Gryph-charger allies.
Intro: A Lord-Aquilor is armed with a Heavy Boltstorm Pistol, Starbound Blade and Shock Handaxe.

Rules.Name: Battalions
Rules.Rule: BATTALIONS: This warscroll can be used in the following warscroll battalions: • Lords of the Exemplar Chamber • Lords of the Harbinger Chamber • Lords of the Warrior Chamber

Rules.Name: Mount
Rules.Rule: MOUNT: This unit's Gryph-charger is armed with a Razor Beak and Claws.

Rules.Name: Ride The Winds Aetheric
Rules.Fluff: Gryph-chargers can move faster than the eye can follow along the winds aetheric.
Rules.Rule: Ride the Winds Aetheric: Instead of picking this unit to make a normal move or retreat, you can say that it will ride the winds aetheric. If you do so, remove this unit from the battlefield and set it up again on the battlefield more than 1" from all terrain features and objectives and more than 9" from all enemy units.

Rules.Name: Lord Of The Azyrite Hurricane
Rules.Fluff: The Lord-Aquilor directs their warriors to fade and strike, whirling around the enemy like a cyclone.
Rules.Rule: Lord of the Azyrite Hurricane: Once per battle round, this unit can issue a command to a friendly VANGUARD unit wholly within 18" of this unit without a command point being spent.
